content:
To automate the review of Party Profile records created for onboarding applicants, create an approval process. Use approval processes to specify the sequence of steps necessary to approve a record.

Available in: Lightning Experience in Professional, Enterprise, and Unlimited Editions that have Financial Services Cloud enabled.

USER PERMISSIONS NEEDED
To create and read onboarding-related objects: Financial Services Cloud Extension permission set
To create an approval process: Customize Application

A Party Profile record represents the information about the profile of the applicant. An approval process for Party Profile specifies each step of approval, including from whom to request approval and what to do at each point of the process.

From Setup, find and select Approval Processes. For Manage Approval Processes For, select Party Profile. Click Create New Approval Process and then select Use Standard Setup Wizard.

Enter Approve Party Profile as the name for the approval process. If you enter a different name, make sure to update references in the flow Onboarding: Request Party Profile Approval.

If only certain types of records should enter this approval process, enter that criteria and click Next. Select the field to use for automated approval routing.

Under Record Editability Properties, select Administrators ONLY can edit records during the approval process. Click Next. If you created an email template, select it to notify approvers of assigned approval requests.

Select fields to show on the Approval page layout from the Available Fields list and add them to the Selected Field. For example, Party Profile Name, Owner Name, Created Date as the fields to show.

Display approval history information in addition to selected fields. Under Security Settings, select Allow approvers to access the approval page only from within the Salesforce application (Recommended).

Specify which users are allowed to submit initial requests for approval. Save your changes.

Add an Approval Step to determine records that can advance and the approver, and whether to let an approver's delegate respond to requests.

Add Field Updates to change selected fields after the approval process is complete. You can add updates for Final Approval Actions and Final Rejection Actions.

Activate the Approval Process to Approve Party Profile Records after setting it up.
title: Configuring Approval Processes for Party Profiles in Financial Services Cloud
